summary: This bill, the "Bringing Oversight to Washington and Safety to Every Resident Act" (BOWSER Act), introduced in the House of Representatives on February 6, 2025, aims to repeal the District of Columbia Home Rule Act. It seeks to eliminate the existing framework for self-governance in Washington, D.C., with the repeal taking effect one year after the bill's enactment. The bill was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform and the Committee on Rules for review.
